name: card-price-tracker
description: A powerful CLI tool for fetching and managing card data from the CardTrader API

scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run batch          - Process all expansions (1-2 hours)' && echo '  npm run pokemon        - Process Pokémon cards (10-15 min)' && echo '  npm run magic          - Process Magic cards (15-20 min)' && echo '  npm run test           - Test with 3 specific expansions (1-2 min)' && echo '  npm run games          - List all available games' && echo '  npm run pokemon-list   - List Pokémon expansions' && echo '  npm run magic-list     - List Magic expansions' && echo '  npm run all-expansions - List ALL expansions (3,340+)' && echo '  npm run all-magic      - List ALL Magic expansions'
